title: Let's Speak Korean Season 2
description:
This is Season 2 from the Arirang network show, "Let's Speak Korean" (new version) with Lisa Kelley.  Codecs are ASF and filenames are in Korean.  If anyone wishes, I will also seed an iPod version (which is much more appropriate on-the-go).

For a preview, search Youtube for "Let's Speak Korean - Season 2"

I downloaded this from a Korean site and I'm not responsible for the poor quality codec or audio clicks.  Lisa Kelley is some pretty, though.

The show is currently in Season 4 on Arirang and you can even see some videos on-demand at their site.  I'm not sure I love this show and I will share it only as long as I see fit, so if you want it, get it now...
